dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Sam, do you know what my mother does?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: No, what does she do?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: She works at a local production centre. They make television programmes there.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's very interesting! What type of programmes?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: All types. Music programmes, game programmes, and programmes for kids. I help my mother sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Really? Can we visit today?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes! She called me this morning. They need help with something.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Here we are! Hello, Mrs. Johnson.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Hi, Mother. What's the problem?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: We're here to help you.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Mother, you look worried. What is it?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Is everything okay?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: She says they have a problem with tonight's programme. The young person who does the music section can't come today.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Oh no! That's a big problem. What will you do?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Mother says we need to find somebody quickly. The programme is at seven tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Wait! I have an idea. My brother knows all about music. He's available today.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: That's a better option! Can you call him right now?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Yes, I'll call him. He's at home.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Sam, you're a good friend. I care about you very much.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: He said yes! He can be here in one hour.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Wonderful! Mother is so happy. The programme will be good tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: I hope everything goes well. Can we watch it together tonight?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Of course! Let's watch it at my home at seven.
